content: laura pullover shown in dimond laine elmer fingering and dimond laine birdie laura pullover by the lamb & kid a sweater to transition through the seasons -- a sweet mock neck and a simple raglan yoke flow into a slightly cropped body and three-quarter length sleeves this piece is worked at a worsted-weight gauge so your yarn possiblities are endless mix yarns as we ve done here or pick your favorite worsted-weight yarn and have a go stripes marls color-blocking -- it all works needles needles listed are suggested gauge needle size us 7/ 4 5mm 9 /22 5cm or dpns 16 /40cm 24 /60cm and
